text: Great food, great service. Baghale polo with lamb shank and the saffron chicken were amazing. We enjoyed every dish. Thank you Sunshine Catering, for all the yummy food.
We ordered few times from them and always have a very pleasant experience.very tasty and affordable food among a big selection of persian cuisine. Thank you sunshine

Great food! Sunshine Catering's food tastes just like homemade Persian food. Their Kabob is by far the best I have had! I will definitely order more from them. The owners are easy to work with and their prices are very reasonable.

Looking forward to continue with their awesome service and delicious foods for our parties! Sunshine Catering has the best Persian food and the most responsible owners here in Phoenix! Highly recommended, leave everything to them and enjoy your next party!
